mapper.select: SELECT bs.storage_id as storageId, bs.roadway, bs.row_no as rowNo, bs.column_no as columnNo, bs.level_no as levelNo, bs.putaway_move_line_no as putawayMoveLineNo, IFNULL(bs.surplus_load,0) as surplusLoad, IFNULL(bs.surplus_volume,0) as surplusVolume, bs.surplus_can_put_salver as surplusCanPutSalver, IFNULL(bmt.volume,0) as volume, IFNULL(bmt.net_weight,0) as netWeight FROM base_storage_material bsm LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON bsm.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bsm.material_id = bmt.material_id WHERE bs.warehouse_id =#{warehouseId} AND bsm.material_id =#{materialId} and bsm.org_id=#{orgId} and bs.storage_type=1

select bs.putaway_move_line_no From wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON bs.storage_id = wii.storage_id where bs.storage_type=1 and wii.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId} and wii.material_id = #{materialId} and wii.org_id=#{orgId} order by wii.modified_time desc limit 1

SELECT bs.storage_id as storageId, bs.roadway, bs.row_no as rowNo, bs.column_no as columnNo, bs.level_no as levelNo, bs.putaway_move_line_no as putawayMoveLineNo, IFNULL(bs.surplus_load,0) as surplusLoad, IFNULL(bs.surplus_volume,0) as surplusVolume, bs.surplus_can_put_salver as surplusCanPutSalver, IFNULL(bmt.volume,0) as volume, IFNULL(bmt.net_weight,0) as netWeight FROM wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wii.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON wii.material_id = bmt.material_id WHERE bs.storage_type=1 and wii.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} AND wii.material_id=#{materialId} AND wii.batch_code=#{batchCode} and wii.org_id=#{orgId}

SELECT bs.storage_id as storageId, bs.roadway, bs.row_no as rowNo, bs.column_no as columnNo, bs.level_no as levelNo, bs.putaway_move_line_no as putawayMoveLineNo, IFNULL(bs.surplus_load,0) as surplusLoad, IFNULL(bs.surplus_volume,0) as surplusVolume, bs.surplus_can_put_salver as surplusCanPutSalver, IFNULL(bmt.volume,0) as volume, IFNULL(bmt.net_weight,0) as netWeight FROM wms_inner_inventory wii LEFT JOIN base_storage bs ON wii.storage_id = bs.storage_id LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bmt.material_id=wii.material_id WHERE bs.storage_type=1 AND wii.job_status=1 AND wii.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} AND wii.material_id=#{materialId} and wii.org_id=#{orgId} ORDER BY wii.modified_time DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT bs.storage_id as storageId, bs.roadway, bs.row_no as rowNo, bs.column_no as columnNo, bs.level_no as levelNo, bs.putaway_move_line_no as putawayMoveLineNo, IFNULL(bs.surplus_load,0) as surplusLoad, IFNULL(bs.surplus_volume,0) as surplusVolume, bs.surplus_can_put_salver as surplusCanPutSalver, IFNULL(bmt.volume,0) as volume, IFNULL(bmt.net_weight,0) as netWeight FROM base_storage bs LEFT JOIN base_material_tab bmt ON bmt.material_id=#{materialId} WHERE bs.org_id=#{orgId} and bs.storage_id IN(SELECT wii.storage_id FROM wms_inner_inventory wii WHERE bs.storage_type=1 AND wii.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId} and wii.packing_qty>0 GROUP BY wii.storage_id HAVING COUNT(wii.material_id)>1)
